ComicInfo.Summary:
Volume 2
Information: Most information about individual issues can be found on the official 2000AD site starting at http://www.2000ad.org/?zone=prog
Numbering: When publisher Rebellion took over the publishing of the Megazine, they started with issue number 201. If this series hadn't been restarted from #1 the issues had been #21-103.On-sale date taken from previous issue.
